tool.name: SAGA.grid_visualisation.11
tool.description: Create a Table from Look-up Table
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayLUT False output_data_TABLE $output_data_TABLE name SAGA.grid_visualisation.11 LUT $LUT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TABLE $OutputSection_TABLE.outputType_TABLE transmissionMode_TABLE $OutputSection_TABLE.transmissionMode_TABLE

param.name: LUT
param.label: Look-up Table
param.help: Look-up Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TABLE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_TABLE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Creates a table object from a look-up table for visual data object classifications. Useful in combination with tool chains.
